oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Photograph postcard and instruction card of the U.S.S. Rihndam
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The photograph postcard shows a close on starboard bow view of a well used steam ship tied to a pier. Overwritten on the bow is white ink "U.S.S. RIJNDAM." Below on the waterline "THE SHIP THAT BROUGHT US HOME." The instruction card contains Johnston's bunk, troop space and abandon ship numbers. It lists the rules for the soldiers during their time on board. Johnston served in the Ord. Corps and was attached to the 114th MG Battn., 30th Div.
